snippet: Cpl. David Eric Casebolt, the McKinney police officer shown on video shoving a black girl to the ground outside a pool party, on Wednesday offered an apology through his lawyer.
abstract: Cpl David Eric Casebolt, Texas police officer seen in cellphone video shoving black teenager to ground at pool party, offers apology for his actions; Casebolt's lawyer says he was under stress due to two tense situations encountered earlier in his work day.
lead_paragraph: Cpl. David Eric Casebolt, the McKinney police officer shown on video shoving a black girl to the ground outside a pool party, on Wednesday offered an apology through his lawyer.

headline.main: Texas Officer Was Under Stress When He Arrived at Pool Party, Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Officer Was Under Stress When He Arrived at Texas Pool Party, Lawyer Says
